detailed_info.name: Benzalkonium Chloride
detailed_info.regulation:
For purposes other than inhibiting the development of microorganisms in the product. This purpose must be apparent from the presentation of the product.
The maximum permissible concentration in ready-to-use cosmetic preparations is 0.1% (benzalkonium chloride).

Wording of conditions of employment and warnings:
- Avoid contact with eyes

functions.name: Antimicrobial
functions.description: Helps slowing the growth of micro-organisms on the skin and counteracts the development of microbes

functions.name: Antistatic
functions.description: Reduces static electricity by neutralizing electrical charge on a surface

functions.name: Deodorant
functions.description: Reduces or masks unpleasant body odors

functions.name: Preservative
functions.description: Inhibits the development of microorganisms in cosmetic products.

functions.name: Surfactant-dispersing
functions.description: Help distribute an insoluble solid in a liquid phase. Suspensions or dispersions of liquids in a second liquid are generally called emulsions.
